snippet: The wines sold under second-label programs can be serviceable, pleasurable and not too far in quality from their superior siblings.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews several second label wines from Long Island wineries.
lead_paragraph: The wines sold under second-label programs can be serviceable, pleasurable and not too far in quality from their superior siblings.

headline.seo: For Casual Crowds, Long Island Vintners’ Second Labels
